Name: Francis Almquist
Details: Born 3004. Duke of the Terra Firma District of the Terran Hegemony. Duke Almquist is a firm believer in the Hegemony and has gone on record stating that any worlds in his district that need assistance need only call on him and he will aid them. He has firmly resisted Word of Blake interference in his affairs and stands with Director-General Ian Cameron III on all political matters.
